categoryPosts.title: Representing Equations as Parametric Surfaces
categoryPosts.excerpt: When it comes to visualizing equations, the ability to decompose the equation into parametric equations is key. It is especially useful when creating creative 3D geometric surfaces mathematically and also a fun practice to see equations in a different perspective.
